name: Pixel Shooter (itch) (r3tr0_dev)
description:
Pixel Shooter is a Top-Down Shooter game with randomly generated levels.

It's my first ever project released to the public and my first attempt at making a randomly generated map.

The game is just a prototype of an idea right now and it might get updated in the future with new enemies type, powerups etc.

Code, Art, Music by @r3tr0_dev.

Made with Godot Engine.
